name: The Long Road Back (Demo)
description:
The Long Road Back is a new game in development by myself, which combines the intensity of both atmospheric Horror and first person shooting into a pulsating and suspenseful thrill ride. Ammo is limited, death can be just around the corner... Every shot fired needs to be wise, even reloading at the wrong time could mean the end, can you survive The Long Road Back?

This Game is a short Demo of the full experience, the plans of which are depending on the reception to this launch, any support or feedback is always appreciated! 

GAME CONTROLS (PC):

W,A,S,D To Move

Left Mouse Button To Fire Weapons

Right Mouse Button Hold To Aim/Zoom

R To Reload

1 To Equip Revolver (once obtained)

2 To Equip Shotgun (once obtained)

Esc To Quit Game at Any time

Space Bar To Jump

Walk over items in game to obtain/interact
